Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us and I believe it will be equally beneficial for you. Given its significance, I propose to offer it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also provides a reasonable margin for us while ensuring you receive a high-quality asset at an attractive cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
